title: Initialize Next.js App Router & Tooling
description: Scaffold Next.js 14+ project, configure TypeScript strict mode, install Tailwind CSS/shadcn-ui, and setup ESLint/Prettier with accessibility plugins.
acceptance_criteria: Build pipeline passes; Linter validates a11y; Theme provider functional

title: Design & Migrate PostgreSQL Schema
description: Define Prisma schema for Users, Merchants, Roles (RBAC), and AuditLogs. Run initial migration.
acceptance_criteria: Schema includes multi-tenant keys; Migration successful; Prisma Client generated

title: Implement JWT Service (RS256)
description: Create utility for signing/verifying tokens. Implement dual-token architecture (Access/Refresh) with HttpOnly cookies.
acceptance_criteria: Tokens use RS256; Refresh tokens in HttpOnly cookie; Rotation logic works
definition_of_done: Unit tests pass; Security audit check
testing_requirements: Security unit tests, Token expiry tests

title: Develop RBAC Middleware
description: Implement Next.js middleware to intercept routes, decode JWT, and verify role permissions against requested resource.
acceptance_criteria: Blocks unauthorized roles; Passes authorized roles; Performance overhead < 10ms
definition_of_done: Integration tests passing for protected routes

title: Implement OAuth Authorization Handler
description: Create API route to redirect user to Salla, generating and storing 'state' for CSRF protection.
acceptance_criteria: Correct Salla URL generation; State stored securely
definition_of_done: Manual OAuth flow verified; Unit tests

title: Implement OAuth Callback & Token Storage
description: Handle callback, validate state, exchange code for tokens, encrypt (AES-256) and store in Postgres.
acceptance_criteria: State mismatch returns 400; Tokens exchanged; Tokens encrypted at rest

title: Develop Recursive Sync Worker (Orders)
description: Build QStash consumer to fetch orders. Implement recursive job chaining to handle Vercel timeout limits.
acceptance_criteria: Fetches pages recursively; Respects 10s limit; Handles 429s
definition_of_done: Load test with 10k orders; Reliability verification

title: Implement Salla Webhook Verification & Queueing
description: Create webhook endpoint to verify HMAC signature and push payload to QStash (Fire-and-forget).
definition_of_done: Load test passing; Signature verification unit tests

title: Configure ClickHouse Connection & Schema
description: Setup ClickHouse client, define MergeTree tables for SalesFact and AbandonedCartFact.
acceptance_criteria: Client connects SSL; Tables created; Query works

title: Develop CDC Processor (Postgres to ClickHouse)
description: Build worker to consume events/changes, transform data structure, and insert into ClickHouse using Batching.
acceptance_criteria: Transforms relational to wide-table; Batches inserts; Deduplicates
definition_of_done: End-to-end latency < 5 mins; Data consistency verified

title: Develop Aggregation API (Sales)
description: Create API to query ClickHouse SalesFact. Support GroupBy (hour/day) and DateRange filtering.
acceptance_criteria: Response < 200ms P95; Strict merchant_id scoping; Validates dates
definition_of_done: Performance benchmark passed; API docs updated

title: Implement Sales Chart Components
description: Build Recharts Line/Bar components with responsive container and loading skeletons.
acceptance_criteria: Matches Shadcn UI theme; Responsive; Tooltips work
definition_of_done: Visual regression test passed; Mobile verify

title: Enable pgvector & Context Embedding Pipeline
description: Setup pgvector in Postgres. Build pipeline to generate embeddings for Product/Order schemas using OpenAI.
acceptance_criteria: Vectors stored; Semantic search returns relevant context

title: Implement Rich Text Template Editor
description: Integrate TipTap/Quill with variable substitution ({{customer_name}}). Sanitize output.
acceptance_criteria: Generates safe HTML; Previews variables correctly
definition_of_done: XSS vulnerability check passed; UX review

title: Develop Recovery Job Scheduler
description: Logic to schedule QStash jobs upon cart abandonment. Worker sends email via Postmark.
acceptance_criteria: Schedules correctly; Checks suppression; Skips converted carts
